verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From the highest of heights,
To the depths of the sea.
Creations revealing your majesty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
From the colors of fall
To the fragrance of spring,
Every creature unique in the song that it sings.
All exclaiming:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Indescribable.
Uncontainable.
You placed the stars in the sky
And You know them by name.
You are amazing God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All powerful.
Untameable.
Awestruck we fall to our knees
As we humbly proclaim:
You are amazing God.
You are amazing God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Who has taught every lightning bolt
Where it should go?
Or seen heavenly store houses
Layered with snow?

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Who imagined the sun
And gives source to its light?
Yet conceals it to bring us the coolness of night.
None can fathom.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Indescribable.
Uncontainable.
You placed the stars in the sky
And You know them by name.
You are amazing God.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
All powerful.
Untameable.
Awestruck we fall to our knees
As we humbly proclaim:
You are amazing God.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Incomparable.
Unchangeable.
You see the depths of my heart
And you love me the same.
You are amazing God.
